com.github.alexjlockwood.kyrie

Interface KyrieDrawable.Listener

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    KyrieDrawable.ListenerAdapter
    Enclosing class:
    KyrieDrawable

    public static interface KyrieDrawable.Listener
    A listener that receives notifications from an animation. Notifications indicate animation related events, such as the start or end of the animation.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void onAnimationCancel(KyrieDrawable drawable)
      Notifies the cancellation of the animation.
      void onAnimationEnd(KyrieDrawable drawable)
      Notifies the end of the animation.
      void onAnimationPause(KyrieDrawable drawable)
      Notifies that the animation was paused.
      void onAnimationResume(KyrieDrawable drawable)
      Notifies that the animation was resumed, after being previously paused.
      void onAnimationStart(KyrieDrawable drawable)
      Notifies the start of the animation.
      void onAnimationUpdate(KyrieDrawable drawable)
      Notifies the occurrence of another frame of the animation.

    • Method Detail

      • onAnimationStart

        void onAnimationStart(KyrieDrawable drawable)
        Notifies the start of the animation.
        Parameters:
        drawable - The KyrieDrawable instance being started.

      • onAnimationUpdate

        void onAnimationUpdate(KyrieDrawable drawable)
        Notifies the occurrence of another frame of the animation.
        Parameters:
        drawable - The KyrieDrawable instance being updated.

      • onAnimationPause

        void onAnimationPause(KyrieDrawable drawable)
        Notifies that the animation was paused.
        Parameters:
        drawable - The KyrieDrawable instance being paused.
        See Also:
        KyrieDrawable.pause()

      • onAnimationResume

        void onAnimationResume(KyrieDrawable drawable)
        Notifies that the animation was resumed, after being previously paused.
        Parameters:
        drawable - The KyrieDrawable instance being resumed.
        See Also:
        KyrieDrawable.resume()

      • onAnimationCancel

        void onAnimationCancel(KyrieDrawable drawable)
        Notifies the cancellation of the animation.
        Parameters:
        drawable - The KyrieDrawable instance being canceled.

      • onAnimationEnd

        void onAnimationEnd(KyrieDrawable drawable)
        Notifies the end of the animation. This callback is not invoked for animations with repeat count set to INFINITE.
        Parameters:
        drawable - The KyrieDrawable instance being ended.
